short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facilitates the reading experience on multiple news websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This product makes reading news articles much easier and more open. Anytime you would like to read an article, just click the icon, and the content will be unobstructed and completely accessible.

For a full list of compatible websites, visit: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KuNpU4EGB57HuHUmQWtwd_v26aUwN0kS743hSNyeMJg/edit?usp=sharing.

For questions about the use of this product, please email at gamessimpleextension@gmail.com.

Updates:
Version 1.1: Added support for restrictions posed by AdBlock detection.
Version 1.1.1: Bug fixes for NY Times
